scripts.reset:dev: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d --build && docker compose exec backend node populateMinio.js && docker compose exec backend node populateUsers.js
scripts.reset:prod: docker compose down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.production.yml up -d --build && docker compose exec backend node populateMinio.js && docker compose exec backend node populateUsers.js
